item.title: By: Kevin Langston
item.dc:creator: Kevin Langston
item.description: I much prefer looking at this whole "writer comments on his own entry" affair as something more postmodern than pathetic. No matter, I would be remiss if I didn't link to <a href="http://www.coverbrowser.com/covers/worst-album-covers" rel="nofollow">this</a>.
item.content:encoded: I much prefer looking at this whole “writer comments on his own entry” affair as something more postmodern than pathetic. No matter, I would be remiss if I didn’t link to this.
